import axios from"axios";//const BASE_URL = "http://softwareengineeringnodetest-env.eba-86qtfsgp.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com"
var BASE_URL="http://my-node-express-project-env.eba-hxq4pgvm.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com";var TUITS_API="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/tuits");var USERS_API="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/users");export var findAllTuits=function findAllTuits(){return axios.get(TUITS_API).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var findTuitById=function findTuitById(tid){return axios.get("".concat(TUITS_API,"/").concat(tid)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var findTuitByUser=function findTuitByUser(uid){return axios.get("".concat(USERS_API,"/").concat(uid,"/tuits")).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var createTuit=function createTuit(uid,tuit){return axios.post("".concat(USERS_API,"/").concat(uid,"/tuits"),tuit).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var updateTuit=function updateTuit(tid,tuit){return axios.post("".concat(TUITS_API,"/").concat(tid),tuit).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var deleteTuit=function deleteTuit(tid){return axios.delete("".concat(TUITS_API,"/").concat(tid)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};
